snippet: The leader, Sam Rainsy, was ordered held in connection with a seven-year-old defamation case.
abstract: Court orders arrest of Cambodian legislator Sam Rainsey in latest round of ongoing antagonism between opposition leader and country's top officials.
lead_paragraph: The leader, Sam Rainsy, was ordered held in connection with a seven-year-old defamation case.

headline.main: Cambodia: Court Orders Arrest of Opposition Leader
headline.print_headline: Asia; Cambodia: Court Orders the Arrest of an Opposition Leader in an Old Case
